original_text: “No one whose testicles are crushed or whose male organ is cut off shall enter the assembly of the Lord.
korean_text: 고환이 상한 자나 음경이 잘린 자는 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: No one whose testicles are crushed
or whose male organ is cut off
shall enter the assembly of the Lord.
